Ship It Instead

Previous I Next

With Manhattan Active® Omni Ship It Instead, buy online pickup in store (BOPIS) items can be converted to ship to address. Customers can convert items to be shipped using Digital Self-Service if they can't pick up their items at the store or if the store shorts the items due to unavailable inventory. Store associates can also convert items to be shipped if customers are unable to pick up their items.

Offering Ship It Instead reduces BOPIS cancellations due to consumer no-shows and store shorts. Manhattan Active® Omni Digital Self-Service, Order Management, and Store Inventory & Fulfillment facilitate seamless BOPIS to shipment conversions. Refer to the pages below for details of each feature.
